front.title: SIEVE Email Filtering: Spamtest and Virustest Extensions

abstract.t: The SIEVE email filtering language "spamtest", "spamtestplus" and "virustest" extensions permit users to use simple, portable commands for spam and virus tests on email messages. Each extension provides a new test using matches against numeric "scores". It is the responsibility of the underlying SIEVE implementation to do the actual checks that result in proper input to the tests.
